00011 /****************************************************************************
00012  * Public function implementations
00013  ****************************************************************************/
00014 inline void
00015 arrow_xml_element_int(char *name, int value, FILE *out)
00016 {
00017     fprintf(out, "<%s>%d</%s>\n", name, value, name);
00018 }
00019 
00020 inline void
00021 arrow_xml_element_double(char *name, double value, FILE *out)
00022 {
00023     fprintf(out, "<%s>%.5f</%s>\n", name, value, name);
00024 }
00025 
00026 inline void
00027 arrow_xml_element_string(char *name, char *value, FILE *out)
00028 {
00029     fprintf(out, "<%s>%s</%s>\n", name, value, name);
00030 }
00031 
00032 inline void
00033 arrow_xml_element_bool(char *name, int value, FILE *out)
00034 {
00035     fprintf(out, "<%s>%d</%s>\n", name, (value ? 1 : 0), name);
00036 }
00037 
00038 inline void
00039 arrow_xml_attribute_int(char *name, int value, FILE *out)
00040 {
00041     fprintf(out, " %s=\"%d\"", name, value);
00042 }

00045 arrow_xml_attribute_string(char *name, char *value, FILE *out)

00050 inline void
00051 arrow_xml_element_start(char *name, FILE *out)
00052 {
00053     fprintf(out, "<%s", name);
00054 }
00055 
00056 inline void
00057 arrow_xml_element_end(FILE *out)
00058 {
00059     fprintf(out, ">\n");
00060 }

00063 arrow_xml_element_open(char *name, FILE *out)
00064 {
00065     fprintf(out, "<%s>\n", name);
00066 }
00067 
00068 inline void
00069 arrow_xml_element_close(char *name, FILE *out)

00071     fprintf(out, "</%s>\n", name);

00078 }
00079

00081 arrow_xml_attribute_end(FILE *out)
